website_summaries.verdict: This Inspiron from Dell is an incredible deal that's hard to beat.
pros: Competes with laptops twice as expensive
cons: Screen resolution is limited to 1920x1080, so screen real estate is limited

customer_reviews.title: I am a loyal Dell customer but..... UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a dell customer and 100% happy with every product I have gotten from them, But this laptop is not quite what I expected. It freezes up at least once every other time I turn it on. The screen flickers before it freezes then I have to do a hard boot to get it going. UPDATE: I have changed my star rating because all it needed was Bios updated:) Am now happy with my laptop and will continue to be a Loyal Dell fan!
customer_reviews.author: LJF

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: After shopping for months for a 15" laptop, in my price range, I finally decided on this Dell. I wanted an I5 processor with 8 g of Ram and this unit is perfect for me to run my business on. I use MS Office as a cloud based app so I'm able to use this anywhere I have an internet connection. The screen size is easy to see and the keyboard feels good to type on. The best part for me is the keyboard is back-lit. For me I have to have a back-lit keyboard so I can type faster. Overall it is a very good value for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tommyray

customer_reviews.title: Have this computer for 5 months and screen died, ...
customer_reviews.text: Have this computer for 5 months and screen died, mouse malfunction, audio not working, can not even reboot. Not been drop, just normal use to read stuff, this is the only computer I bought had a such short life, contacted seller, have to wait 2 business day for reply. Buy a different model, this one not worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Lee1k1p

customer_reviews.title: Problems arouse a month after purchase. Too late to return. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it new and it a month later it started freezing. Unable to move the mouse cursor or close any windows. Too late to return. After being let down by both HP and Dell over the years, I'm done with them. No longer purchasing anything from these two companies ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Mushran

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have CD/DVD drive as shown in the pictures !
customer_reviews.text: Although the device is good, I felt I was fooled by the ad because it shows CD/DVD drive in the images. Yes it was never mentioned in the specs, but the images are shows something that is not there ! Never expected that in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bahnan

customer_reviews.title: Good solid laptop
customer_reviews.text: Because of the new technology, this 15.6 screen is very comparable to the 17" of my last Dell. Very happy with this computer. It's fast, the backlit keyboard is a nice feature and the touch screen is a big step up for me. I do wish, however, that there was a downloadable user's guide. The only manual I've found online is related to taking apart and reassembling the computer. I need to understand basics such as what are "sticky keys" and how/when to use them! There is also an occasional loud hum in the audio that I don't know to whom i should complain..
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Good one.
customer_reviews.text: Good one. Only downside is, it didn't have USB Type-C port, as mentioned in the description. It has finger print sensor though, which is not mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Sriram

customer_reviews.title: Good style!!! but it is not my favoite...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop has a very nice style, it is quite functional and I like that it has multiple ports of entries, that is enough for the functions that I use, however this laptop is not my favorite, since the touch screen is a bit slow for react and sincerely to be an i5 processor is a bit slow. but the rest is fine, good internal memory capacity and good graphics. ✅✅ If you found my review helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking the helpful button below!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhonatan P.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Started right up, set up went well. Tried to boot it up the very next day & the screen went blank. Kept trying to turn it on and it wouldn't get past the Dell login page before going blank. I am not an IT person so i called Dell & was on the phone for over two hours, trying multiple fixes, even going so far as trying to do a factory reset. Computer still would not start, told it was corrupted. Dell then tried to sell me a software warranty before they would fix it. Sent it back & bought an HP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop in January, started using it in March and now I have a black screen that turns off and on and it’s only June. I had it a total of 6 months. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the negative reviews, unless someone bought it refurbished. I ran the Dell SupportAssist and Windows Update to update the software and tune up the performance and I have to say that this is a very fast machine, and has features that I don't even use at this point. I shopped for all the deals online, and kept going back to this one. I like Dells, and top that off with the 5% I get back using my Prime Visa card, and the way I can count on Amazon to stand behind what they sell was enough to convince me that this was the best deal. I could not beat the price, and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GaryL

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased 2018 Dell Inspiron 15 5000 15.6 inch Full HD Backlit Keyboard Laptop PC, Intel Core i5-8250U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4, 1TB HDD, DVD RW, Bluetooth 4.2, WIFI, Windows 10 ; after receiving it i spent hours setting the computer up vid the Web but when i started to load my programs from my CDs i was surprised that it did not have the DVD RW. I returned it to Amazon-Thank you Amazon but please have your vendors advertise correct information. So glad that i decided to set it up before Christmas, it definitely would have been a Terrible Gift! Now that I have missed some great deals during the sales of Black Friday, i start the search again :(
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 2.65LB LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item and it weighs 4lbs 9oz. The description is incorrect and misleading. Likely will return.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: God quality machine
customer_reviews.text: alot of people have issue ease to repair if you have issue with your update please use wu170509.diagcab is a fix available by microsoft repair your database update if you have performance problema instal avg tunup if you have drivers problems installed driverbooster all issues in bad review are about a windows software, and those have ease to repair. this machine use a best standar parts like core i5 8250U all brand new machines need update because that updates has part of the basic mantenace of our machine
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo

customer_reviews.title: Dingy Dell does not Inspire
customer_reviews.text: I expected more than this from Dell. While the specs and performance are good - especially for the price - a "Flagship" it ain't. Why? The display is dim and the color rendition is gruesome. I have futzed endlessly with the Intel Graphics Settings sliders until I surely have carpal tunnel syndrome. If Dell is able to make me happy with the display, I will revise this 2-Star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: The hard disk drive don't work
customer_reviews.text: I have just used this laptop because my wife didn't like it because it's a little bit big for her so I left it at home, now I am trying to use it but appears on screen that it can't recognice the disk, I have tried with the Dell support software but did not work. I just want to know where can I go to get support and if I have guaranty or not for the equipment a friend told me it can be just a loose wire or a broken disk.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Zeballos Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great Business+Personal Laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far, an excellent purchase decision. Hooked up my 2 ea. 27" monitors & graphics are excellent. I added another 8G of RAM & the process was way more cumbersome than it should have been, requiring near total disassembly of the chassis. Once installed & reassembled though, all is well. Great business+personal laptop; my only complaint is it does not awaken from sleep via mouse or keyboard...lot's of info about this on the web, so it's apparently a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Klaatu Barada Nicto

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I must not have read all the aspects of this because it is better than I expected. I wanted something with a backlit keyboard and that was lightweight. This has that but it's also a touchscreen, I didn't pay attention to that part. The only downside, mine doesn't like the fingerprint scanner. If I use it recognizes me, but then it acts weird and I can't get the cursor to show up. But that isn't a big deal for me, so I still give 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop, a little slow
customer_reviews.text: A great laptop. I was surprised that I could play World of Warcraft pretty easily on it! It does run a little slower on basic startup and general web browsing especially for a brand new laptop, but it looks amazing and does everything I need. I do a lot of graphic design for work and the large screen and awesome quality screen resolution make it great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop I have ever purchased...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 12/31/17. It is currently 2/8/19 and this laptop is nearing death's door. I am no tech genius, however I am knowledgeable on how to treat a laptop and keep it going. My laptops (none of which were a DELL) lasted on average 4 years. This trash will be replaced soon. At least I know now not to purchase a DELL PC or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A Cari

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer, but Windows 10 home can't do a proper software update when I have an antivirus on. It causes the blue screen of death. I have to say that I totally freak out when it happen!! I taught that my brand new computer came damage, but when I uninstalled the antivirus everything went smoothly, the update was fine and I havent see the blue screen again. I recommend this laptop, but be careful with windows 10 and the antivirus
customer_reviews.author: ana guillen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work in record time.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for ~3 hours; it arrived this morning. I know how to set-up a computer, so I began by simply downloading the Windows Apps that were on my older laptop. Not only did the Dropbox sync crash, but the entire laptop crashed - twice - simply trying to download apps. I have a 1GB FIOS wifi, so, yeah. I haven't even used the web, logged in/restored any of my login credentials, etc. The laptop was asked to do ONE thing, and it failed miserably. Back it goes. STAY FAR AWAY. Dell & Hewlett-Packard in particular, are building utter garbage. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this Dell product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January 2018. In less than a year it crashed. It was under warranty so it was repaired. Now, about a year and half after purchase, it does not charge unless I move the charger plug around in the socket and happen to get it to make the connection. Then I try to hold it in that position while it charges the battery. I replaced the charger, but that didn't solve the problem, so it's internal. I used to have a Dell desktop computer which was great, but I cannot recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Battery is a problem
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't last long and changing it is complicated. The battery is internal so the case has to be pried (literally) apart. You can use gift cards to do the prying but you risk breaking clips that hold the case together. There are 11 screws in varying sizes to keep straight. The DVR has to be removed during dismantling. I've never owned a laptop that goes through a battery very fast, or one that has to be dismantled to do something that should be simple.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value laptop I’ve bought yet. I liked it so much we bought a second one for home. It’s a little slow on startup - the new i5 processor is NOT as fast as the old i7 in my experience. But I can wait an extra 30 seconds on startup for this kind of value. I don’t use the touch screen. But it has plenty of USB ports and I do like the fingerprint scanner. Backlog keyboard - nice size. It’s perfect for my work computer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Great PC at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping, replaced a broken hp split with this and it took about 4hrs doing all of the software and firmware/driver updates plus another hour transferring files and setting up my preferences/settings. Great PC
customer_reviews.author: CajunFireman

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow Processor
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the slowest computers I have owned in the past 15 years. The start-up of the computer is slow, when I try to open a document or program it is slow. Literally takes minutes for this to get a program running. While the lap top operates fine when you get the program or document open, the screen has good quality, Key board is great, BUT it takes several minutes for a program to open. I have uninstalled programs that were sent with the computer, tried a hard drive "clean-up" program, but have had no success speeding up this device ... Battery life is on the low side as well. I would not recommend purchasing this laptop
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: 3 mos old-completely useless
customer_reviews.text: I suspect I got scammed here. Buyer beware. Laptop quit working after 3 months of light use. "blue screen of death". Dell tech support decided it was not a hardware issue. Seems like we did not get a legitimate copy of Windows software with the laptop. I contacted the seller and got no response. No Windows documentation or product ID was included with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Dell
customer_reviews.text: Had this Dell for several months. I do not get the negative reviews. It is new. Boots fast. Shuts down fast. Fingerprint scanner is very easy to use. Touchscreen is very responsive. Screen display is very bright and clear. Backlit keyboard is awesome a must have from now on. Specs do not say it has a dvd/cd tray. so stop complaining, read the specs. Much lighter than my old Toshiba(still a great computer). If I run into any problems I will edit my review, but as of now it is the best laptop I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replace and not repair
customer_reviews.text: Worse laptop buy ever! I made the purchase in late Nov 2019 to use for my bar exam. Bar exams were Feb. 2020. No major issues then. Laptop was seldom used. By April the system crashed. Had to get same reinstalled and two days later it crashed again. Dell would not replace it because they said it was more than 30 days since the purchase. I was in the middle of doing an online law course and had only a few days left before registering for the exams. I am still waiting on FedEx to pick up and for Dell to replace the hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Slow processor
customer_reviews.text: The specs had everything I needed, I thought. This computer has a VERY SLOW processor. Loading programs is like watching molasses run. Loading Internet websites load real slow also. It's like dial up. The processor is Intel Core i5-8250U Quad-Core
customer_reviews.author: Bill J

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable computer. I have had it for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop for basic things. I use Microsoft Office on it a lot, and there are no problems there. I use this for work, no games, no bulky software, and this works well for everything I use it for. If you want a computer to store lots of pictures, videos, and other files, surf the web, and use basic computer programs, this computer will very much meet your needs. I had one issue with the DVD drive, which turned out to be a hardware issue. It was covered under the warranty, and I received a replacement drive that works great now.
customer_reviews.author: CJSparrow

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Useless laptop. Extremely heavy and bulky to carry around. The description said 2.6 lbs but that’s not accurate. It’s at least 5 lbs. screen resolution is terrible. The battery lasted 3 hours at most. It’s extremly slow right out of the package. Fan is also way to loud. What a garbage laptop. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great performer, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. She wanted a "faster" computer for the internet but didn't need anything elaborate, and this filled the bill for a well made laptop that isn't ridiculously expensive. Out of the box it takes a while for it to go through all the updates and whatnot, but after those are complete it performs excellent, very fast. The whole computer in general works every bit as good and maybe even better than my Dell Latitude 5580 work laptop that was much more expensive. Praises and absolutely no complaints about it from the wife, so mission accomplished! I can easily recommend this as a very good laptop in the low price field.
customer_reviews.author: MLNL Laboratory

customer_reviews.title: Okay one!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Faster than my old 2013 Asus laptop. The video quality is same as the old Asus laptop. Audio quality is better. Cons: Took 3 hours to get windows update while setting up the laptop for the first time. While using this laptop constantly hear this annoying "crackling" noise - maybe related to hard disk or fan - not sure. Having used an Asus laptop and now owing a Dell one -- if I have to make a choice in future --will buy an Asus one if the price is not that high. I don't see much quality difference between Asus and Dell - so why should anyone pay more for Dell?
customer_reviews.author: N. Naik

customer_reviews.title: A good Dell Laptop computer at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The entire process of the purchase and very fast delivery from this seller went well. I am a Dell customer and fan because I have received great support and assistance from Dell in the past , would recommend this great seller and the Dell product he sold me. No worries here.
customer_reviews.author: OliveOil

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Dell
customer_reviews.text: Good computer! I bought it like a month ago, and the computer seems to work perfectly fine. It has not shown any problems yet. I love it! Also, I attached two pictures so you can take a look to the product. As you can see, the keyboards light up with white light. The tactil screen is also attractive and it wasn't as annoying as I thought it would be. Thanks Dell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That the computer was not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: There was not all that much to like. The dislikes are the Ultra HD graphics are far from ultra. The picture quality was washed at best and there is no way to adjust the contrast. I spent many hours of testing and research before discovering that the WiFi adapter had crapped out. If I had read the reviews more closely I woudln't have made the purchase . It was an overall bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints at all about my Dell computer.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, love the back lighted keyboard, & love the silver metal case soooo much better than the cases that are just plastic. I've always been partial to Dell & this one sure does not disappoint! It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Beadwoman

customer_reviews.title: Runs Ubuntu
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I swapped the hard drive for a SSD and loaded Ubuntu 18.04. So far, no issues. I noticed it has a M.2 SSD slot so I'll probably install one and add another 8gb at some point. (Model 5570)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discouraging
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to get a decent product at a decent price. Didn’t even make it through 1 semester before encountering numerous problems with the system and software. After 4 months it would cost 50% of what I paid for the machine. To “hopefully” fix the problems.... trash
customer_reviews.author: dl83

customer_reviews.title: Stopped responding and acting slow
customer_reviews.text: Hours into getting started with updates and all it stops responding to clicks now I don't know what to do nothing is in it so why isn't it responding or acting slow. Almost a year later, it had to be sent in for repairs because the hard start just stopped working and now the battery has gone bad. My previous laptops lasted at least 5 years each before giving me problems.
customer_reviews.author: Morry

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning computer when received! Had to get it repaired in order for it to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product I had to have it repaired because keys were not working and the cord for the fan to the computer cooling system was up in the fan and would surely have been cut by the fan. I am getting an invoice for the repairs to send to the seller because I don't feel like it is fair for me to spend $400+ on a computer that was not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Bowling

customer_reviews.title: loud fan sound
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it only becausethe fan sounded so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan L

customer_reviews.title: Slooooowwwww processor
customer_reviews.text: Got the computer and everything was working fine. Then I was forced to install Windows 10 Feature Update 1903 and the computer became slower than a snail in slow motion. Also the description inaccurately says it's 1.5 GHz - 3.4 GHz. However, as shipped, the laptop is 1.5GHz, which is also why it's very, very slow. I called tech support and they said I could only achieve 3.4GHz by overclocking. Wish I had never bought this piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Gil Sery

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Used for homework, internet surfing, some email and music. It does have a DVD player, which it didn't state when I bought mine. NICE BONUS! Quick enough to keep the kid happy (which is saying something). Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop by Dell
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is too much slow, sometime even its not responding as well. I will not recommend anybody to buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: Komal

customer_reviews.title: May have to send back!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this 3 days ago... Got it all set up. Keeps freezing up or slow to repsond. Does not work like a new laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive keeps going out
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the hard drive went out! Sent it back and they fixed it. Then one month after warranty went out so did the hard drive went out again. Would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Funderburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this computer for my teen son for his birthday. The one that was sent wouldn’t turn on. I returned it to Dell and they replaced it with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K. Begley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop for a really good price
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of good features we installed a memory upgrade but not a lot of other things to do its turnkey. Start it up and off you go.
customer_reviews.author: Gino T A Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Laptop was purchased for my high schooler. After completing the initial setup I found the laptop to have a great screen quality; accurate touch-screen; and good battery life. Processor could be a little faster, but overall I am satisfied with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't hold a charge. The speakers are awful. I bought this for my daughter for christmas. It's so frustrating my daughter never uses is.
customer_reviews.author: mombomb2008

customer_reviews.title: it locks up alot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in march of 2018, it locks up at least once a week sometimes 3 or 4 times. I have to hard boot to bring it back , I use it for email , facebook and youtube. this will be my last dell , the acer I had before was better, I hate being in the middle of something and everything freezes .
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Screen quality could be far better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Slow to start up. Screen varies a lot depending on angle you view. Difficult to edit photos because of this. Otherwise it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: B Scott Methvin

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: My laptop was delivered June 16 and is now showing a huge white vertical line right in the middle of my screen. The battery dies fast and charges slow. The laptop apart from that was amazing I loved it so sad that it’s broken not sure what would cause that it hasn’t been dropped and I don’t really use the touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Hard Drive Failures
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 of these for use in my business in the last two years. I recommend the protection plan if purchasing, as two have had hard drive failures (one within 6 months the other within 3). Next time I am purchasing I will look for another brand / model.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Freezing issue could not be resolved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my daughter for graduation. Froze 6 times in 1st hour. Google had lots of complaints about this same issue. Updated drivers, still freezing. Spent 4 hours with DellSupport.com who finally said seller had installed corrupted Win10 and I should seek their help in fixing. Returned laptop, bought an HP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new, received used.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for new & previous owner had opened from bottom, not breaking the seal. Previous owners name was Steven. Had no problem returning for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop only a few months, barely used it and it will no longer turn on. And if I am lucky enough for it to come on it will randomly make a clicking noise and shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fine little notebook
customer_reviews.text: Fine little notebook for everyday email, browsing, document creation, pics and music.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop really is beautiful, and makes me smile every time I look at it. It has all the cool features. It can be a bit loud and seems to have a relatively small battery life, though I don't really have anything to compare it too, but it's good for everywhere, and runs well.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Medema

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Computer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Christmas gift and it works beautifully. It's lightweight and the keyboard lights up at night. I would purchase this is I ever need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Revels

customer_reviews.title: It is slow and freezes constantly
customer_reviews.text: I had to restart it 2x just to get it set up. It kept freezing. Then when i installed Microsoft office, it froze. Ctrl alt delete did nothing. Mouse would not move. I had to keep turning it off and back on... after having it for 2hrs! So disappointing.... I need it for school TODAY!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this laptop. It didn't have Microsoft Office, had to purchase and install a copy.
customer_reviews.author: Dingodog

customer_reviews.title: incorrect product info
customer_reviews.text: The description includes -1 USB 3.1 Type-C - and it does not have a type C USB port. Not sure if we can get them replaced as we ordered two of them. Otherwise the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: P C for non technical wife.
customer_reviews.text: Good P C for my wife. Worked right out of the box. Size is good. Added a larger external keyboard. That works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Art Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as described. Clearly wasn’t new. Battery wouldn’t charge with the power cord that came with it. Bad product. Wouldn’t trust this company.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Lighted keys and the touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Love true lighted keys and their touch. Good screens size. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine D Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my older Tosiba laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far I've experienced no problems or concerns. I like this model laptop.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get past the Startup Set-Up part (right after turning the computer on for first time) because I couldn't TYPE anything. I spoke with Dell Support, and their suggestion was to get a replacement for the computer because we couldn't 'fix it'.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough for normal work
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is excellent for someone who has basic tasks and for streaming videos. The battery life is good at start but tends to decrease over time. The touch screen can sometimes be annoying. Overall its a good product to have.
customer_reviews.author: akhil

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a Dell, you pretty much get what you pay for. Average quality and average price. It works well and battery life is actually decent. But, for a non-apple laptop, it won't get a 100% from me.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Product great-delivery not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected and I am very pleased. Delivery was another issue - came on time as expected - the box was left leaning on the door between my garage doors when a sign on the garage door clearly states all deliveries to front porch!!!! Glad it was not raining.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Holly Springs

customer_reviews.title: it is a very good computer. I recommend when you received the laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: the computer came with no damage, it works perfectly i have it for about 3 months, it is a very good computer. I recommend when you received the laptop to call dell and let them update all your drivers because the computer run kind of slow for the first time until you let dell update it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good looking laptop and decent configuration for price. The drawback is it is very heavy and can create pain in your laps.
customer_reviews.author: arpn

customer_reviews.title: Super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old computer, this one is a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not as good as what I have now
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was sort of a downgrade for me so I sent it back... it was nice but I need a faster and better quality laptop with an I7 processor etc...
customer_reviews.author: Carlo gobba

customer_reviews.title: User complained of "screen clutter" with default settings.  Will take some time to overcome.
customer_reviews.text: [PRO]Quick set-up; Wi-Fi assist locating existing things like printer, etc.; very light weight; very fast; {maybe should come with a seatbelt!} [CON] Had to "learn" Windows 10 all over again [my problem, not theirs]; new "stuff" will take time to familiarize; I am over 80 and learn slower than decades ago. :=)
customer_reviews.author: John of Port Saint John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It took a little to get used to but now I wouldn't trade it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is junk
customer_reviews.text: This laptop... to say it is slow is an understatement. We have nothing but problems with this laptop, constantly getting kicked out of things. Freezing up & my daughter can't download her games from the internet & play them. Hunk of junk! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price drops $35 a few days after received
customer_reviews.text: The laptop appears to work fine but the fact that the price drops $35. Just after i received it dose not set well with me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Be sure yo check merchandise before shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it within a week. Ran very hot and mother board was going bad. Kept making a clicking g sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Janetsky

customer_reviews.title: Computer stop working with less than 2 moths of usage, with no warranty coverage in Hong Kong
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. less than 2 months, the computer stop working. We live in Hong Kong and bought the Dell product through Amazon with standard warranty and we figured out that it only coverages USA and Canada. Bad experience. Dell needs to learn from Apple about customer experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was to slow. i had 2 reprogram it. so it would run faster
customer_reviews.author: Caol dukes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wireless 802.11ac connections
customer_reviews.text: The wireless 802.11ac is excellent for fast transferring of documents, etc over your network. The TN panel type sometimes makes viewing the display difficult because of it's brightness. Overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Cherubin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Downsizing from a ASUS ROG laptop, and this one works perfect for all my needs. So far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Santa John

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be new.  It did not work
customer_reviews.text: Returned Dell laptop. It did not work. would not go online, despite hours of trying. Supposed to be new, but who knows?
customer_reviews.author: Gene B Cross

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, great help for his university work and homework
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected.....add an SSD of you really want to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Octi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The computer is excellent; however, since all software included in the package are from Microsoft, why not to add an Office pack?
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Failed within two weeks of powering it up.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop failed within two weeks after powering it up. It was a present for my daughter who is a student and lives in Cincinnati. She took it to the Dell microcenter but they would not even troubleshoot the problem because it has a mail in warranty only. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey S Holt

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop March 21, 2018 and on January 20, 2018 it crashed. Less than one year and this laptop goes down on me. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami B

customer_reviews.title: Everything i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it had about 1 month and everything works.. backlight keyboard, touch screen, 8gb, 1tb sound quality works good. Thanks dell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Dell will not warrant this product. It’s problematic at 2 1/2 years old being sold as “new”.???? Would suggest not wasting your monies. Happy computing.!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptoo with a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Responsiveness is great, but this is not a gaming PC, that's why the 3 stars. And to be fair, I havent even tried any games on this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael P.

customer_reviews.title: wifi slow..
customer_reviews.text: unpacked and , loaded with programs etc. then started to set up for local wife and would take hours to download a file that other wifi devices in the same room downloaded just fine. Hence, just packed the Dell Laptop and returned to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: rfk

customer_reviews.title: How can I boost the processing speed?
customer_reviews.text: The screen is wide and touch screen feature is helpful. However, the speed is not encouraging especially when connected to a hotspot and surfing the internet. This is too slow for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: The touch screen is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Screen quality is really good. It’s lighter than I thought and really thin.
customer_reviews.author: SCULLY

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes takes a minute to unlock with touch feature
customer_reviews.text: Wish I was a little faster to wake up, other than that for a work computer it does great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
